tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biotech_food_inventory (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FoodProducts (
   id INT,
   product_name VARCHAR,
   product_type VARCHAR,
   quantity INT,
   price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
   supplier_id INT,
   supplier_name VARCHAR,
   contact_person VARCHAR,
   phone_number VARCHAR,
   email VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
   inventory_id INT,
   product_id INT,
   supplier_id INT,
   quantity INT,
   expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
   order_id INT,
   product_id INT,
   supplier_id INT,
   order_date DATE,
   quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INTEGER,
    supplier_id INTEGER,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity INTEGER,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address TEXT,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Shipments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INTEGER,
    customer_id INTEGER,
    shipment_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
